modules.name: Learn
modules.title: Present Simple & Continuous Lessons
modules.instructions: Master habits, facts, actions in progress, temporary situations, and future uses. Understand the key difference between states and actions.

modules.name: Write
modules.title: Writing Practice
modules.instructions: Write sentences using Present Simple for habits/facts and Present Continuous for actions now/temporary situations.

modules.name: Play
modules.title: Grammar Games
modules.instructions: Play games to practice choosing between Present Simple and Present Continuous in real contexts.

modules.name: Quiz
modules.title: Quick Quiz
modules.instructions: Test your knowledge with multiple choice questions about present tenses. Choose the correct answer to practice quickly!

modules.name: Apply
modules.title: Present Tense Challenge
modules.instructions: Apply both tenses correctly in sentences. Master stative verbs, future uses, and annoying habits.
